item.description:
Ha! Bet you all thought I had forgotten about the meetup! Sorry, between travel and moving I haven't had time to be a model organizer lately. But as the boxes are clearing, so is my schedule. I may change the location but for now we will keep it at Wild Colonial - easy parking, ample space, and not too loud to have a conversation. Hope that is okay with everyone - please speak up if you have other suggestions.

Hope you can all make it!
item.how_to_find_us: Email me if you don't know me. I'll pick a T-shirt or something.
item.name: Montly Meetup
